title: Chirography
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061517/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061517/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Chirography**

The effect of the arm/hand/pen system on letterforms. From the Greek root "_chiro_," meaning "of the hand."  
See [Calligraphy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061517/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Calligraphy), [Ductus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061517/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ductus), [Ductal Logic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061517/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ductal%20Logic).
